context:
Gabriel Macht
Year | Title | Role | Notes
--- | --- | --- | ---
1991 | Beverly Hills , 90210 | Tal Weaver | Episode : Leading from the Heart
1995 | Follow the River | Johnny Draper | TV movie
1997 | Spin City | The Naked Guy | Episode : Snowbound
1998 | Sex and the City | Barkley | Episode : Models and Mortals
1999 | Wasteland | Luke | Episode : Best Laid Plans
2000 | The Audrey Hepburn Story | William Holden | TV movie
2000 | The Others | Dr. Mark Gabriel | Main role , 13 episodes
2005 | Numb3rs | Don Eppes | Episode : Unaired Pilot
2005 | Archangel | R.J. O'Brian | Miniseries
2011-2019 | Suits | Harvey Specter | Lead role ( 9 seasons , 134 episodes ) , also producer
2019 | Pearson | Harvey Specter | 1 episode

wiki_section_title: Filmography -- Television

wiki_section_text: 

intro: Gabriel Swann Macht (born January 22, 1972) is an American actor and film producer best known for playing The Spirit in the eponymous 2008 film adaptation, as well as for his role as Harvey Specter on the USA Network series Suits.

qa.question: How long were the episodes of the series in which Gabriel Macht played Dr. Mark Gabriel in 2000 ?

m.04gcw8_7.Answer Analysis: The answer indicates that the episodes were 40 minutes long.

m.04gcw8_7.Document and Answer Keywords Matching: The document does not mention '40-minute' or any related information about episode duration.
m.04gcw8_7.Key Information Matching: The document only matches the keyword 'Gabriel Macht' and provides no information related to the TV series, the character Dr. Mark Gabriel, or the year 2000.
m.04gcw8_7.Can the Document Answer the Query: No, the document does not provide any information about the TV series or the duration of its episodes.
m.04gcw8_7.Can the Document Help Infer Additional I: No, the document does not contain any relevant information that could help infer the duration of the episodes or any details about the TV series in question.
m.04gcw8_7.Explanation: The document is irrelevant to the query as it only mentions Gabriel Macht in the context of a film released in 2004, which is unrelated to the TV series and the specific character he played in 2000. It provides no useful context or additional information that could assist in answering the query.
